snippet.title: Mark of the Deep - Official Cinematic Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Watch the cinematic trailer for Mark of the Deep, a pirate exploration Metroidvania developed by Mad Mimic. Players will embark on a journey to explore the mysteries of a cursed island and find your missing pirate crew with Soulslike elements. Mark of the Deep is coming soon to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
